name: Pancake 'French Toast' Client
description: The front-end piece of the 'French Toast' Pancake application
author: Sam Foster <sfoster@mozilla.com>

volo-backup.note: Seems `volo add` doesn't like this layout scheme. If we can get the kinks out, then it will be as simple add `volo add -f` to pull in all the latest client-side dependencies. Until then, js/vendor is managed manually and checked into the repo
